Description:
We are looking for an experienced Draftsman with experience working for companies in the medical field to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of drafting principles and practices, as well as experience in the use of CAD software for medical applications. The Draftsman will be responsible for a variety of tasks, including:Creating technical drawings from architectural and engineering designs for medical facilities
Preparing shop drawings and other documentation for medical devices and equipment
Updating drawings as needed
Working with engineers and architects to ensure that drawings are accurate and meet requirements for medical applications
Stay up-to-date on the latest drafting trends and technologies, especially as they relate to the medical fieldSkills
Skills:
Diploma or degree in drafting or a related field
7+ years of experience in drafting.
Strong technical skills, including proficiency in CAD software for medical applications
Excellent attention to detail
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
